sprite

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprite.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EllipseBall

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    The Ball class defines a sprite that can be updated by Observable
    Author:
    kq2

        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of this ball
        color - The color of this ball
        center - The center location of this ball
        vel - The velocity of this ball
        canvas - The canvas contains this ball
        updateStrat - The update strategy of this ball
        paintStrat - The paint strategy of this ball
